name: Improving Productivity
description: Enhancing engineering efficiency through better tools, processes, and workflows.

subItems.name: Developer Velocity
subItems.description: Cycle time from commit to production.
subItems.comments: Recent improvements are showing positive results.

subItems.name: CI/CD Pipeline Optimization
subItems.description: Efficiency and speed of the integration and deployment pipeline.

subItems.name: Engineering Documentation
subItems.description: Quality and availability of technical documentation.

name: Building Reliable Products
description: Ensuring products are robust, available, and performant.

subItems.name: Service Level Uptime
subItems.description: Availability of critical services, measured against SLOs.
subItems.comments: Exceeding SLO targets for 3 consecutive months.

subItems.name: Production Error Rate
subItems.description: Rate of unhandled errors and exceptions in production.
subItems.comments: Spike in errors after recent deployment. Actively investigating.

subItems.name: Performance Testing
subItems.description: Regularity and coverage of performance and load testing.
subItems.comments: Need to expand test coverage for new services.

name: Making Design Resilient
description: Creating scalable and fault-tolerant system architectures.

subItems.name: Onboarding CAT1/CAT2 to SQUAD
subItems.description: Percentage of Apps Onboarded to SQUAD
subItems.comments: Load tests show we can handle 2x traffic.

subItems.name: Usage of Jira Assistant to CAT1/CAT2 Apps
subItems.description: Percentage Adoption of Jira Assist Month on Month
subItems.comments: Last DR drill was successful with zero data loss.

subItems.name: ARC Trainings
subItems.description: Clarity and resilience of inter-service dependencies.

name: Adopting Emerging Tech
description: Leveraging new emerging technologies like AI to drive innovation.

subItems.name: Explore Resiliency Program
subItems.description: Explore Resiliency program to cover the Design & cloud adoption.
subItems.comments: Awaiting budget approval for new initiatives.

subItems.name: Hackathons (Use Case Discovery)
subItems.description: Discover new use cases through hackathons and innovation challenges.
subItems.comments: Last hackathon produced 3 viable project ideas.

subItems.name: Industry Events
subItems.description: Demonstrate DTI Emerging Tech in industry events to foster innovation.

subItems.name: DTI Tech Blogs
subItems.description: Publish blogs and contribute to open source to share knowledge.
subItems.comments: New blog post on our open-source library was published.

subItems.name: Tech Sphere Sessions
subItems.description: Increase participation and audience coverage for Tech Sphere Sessions at DTI.
subItems.comments: Record attendance at the last session.

subItems.name: Mentorship Program
subItems.description: Mentor & Mentee between Business and Technology.

name: World Class Governance
description: Upholding the highest standards of security, compliance, and process.

subItems.name: Security Compliance
subItems.description: Adherence to industry security standards (e.g., SOC 2, ISO 27001).
subItems.comments: SOC 2 Type II audit completed successfully.

subItems.name: Incident Management Process
subItems.description: Clarity and effectiveness of the on-call and incident response process.
subItems.comments: Mean Time to Resolution (MTTR) is down by 15%.

subItems.name: Access Control Policies
subItems.description: Regular review and audit of system access permissions.
